snippet.title: ELDEN RING Shadow of the Erdtree | Story Trailer
snippet.description:
The shadow of the story can now be told. Learn the history of the Realm of Shadow, the unseen land that will be revealed on June 21, 2024.

Pre-order #ELDENRING Shadow of the Erdtree: https://bnent.eu/EldenRing-SOTE

Follow us on:
Web: https://www.eldenring.com 
Discord: https://fcld.ly/eldenring_discord
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/eldenring
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ELDENRING 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ELDENRINGOFFICIAL
